full_summary:
### Tender Notice

**Contract Title**: NOZZLE ASSEMBLY, TANK WASHING
**Contract Reference Number**: cb-7022-96193834
**Solicitation Number**: W8482-231008/B

**Publication Date**: July 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: August 7, 2023, 14:00:00

**Contract Description**: The Department of National Defence seeks suppliers to provide NOZZLE ASSEMBLY, TANK WASHING items as per the following specifications:

* Item 1: GSIN: 4210, NSN: 01-156-8503 (Quantity: 30 EA, for delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia)
* Item 2: GSIN: 4210, NSN: 01-156-8503 (Quantity: 30 EA, for delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)

**Specific Requirements**:

* Suppliers proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must indicate the brand name, model number, and/or Part Number and NCAGE.
* Prices must be quoted in Canadian dollars.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* A preference for Canadian goods and/or services is in place.

**Notice Type and Method**: Request for Proposal (RFP) - Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Attachments**: Tender Notice: [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7022/rfp-w8482-231008-b-eng.pdf)

### Contact Information
* Name: Johan Vizcaya Collado
* Email: [johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca](mailto:johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343 576-4914

Note: The bidder must submit the documents in either official language of Canada. The Crown has the right to negotiate with suppliers. A preference for Canadian products and services is in place. 

--- 

**This is an Expiré Tender**.
